name: DIVI LAND
description: DIVILAND offers innovative ways that traditional real estate markets can never offer. With Artificial Intelligence based solutions, real estate investments and transactions can be easier for anyone to get the best deal which is often difficult due to too high real estate prices. In addition, the transaction process itself is full of pleasure, with additional rewards through tokens and game elements. DIVILAND is a new way to make money just by participating in real estate joint equity purchases, auctions, general sales, and staking has emerged.
